name: LLM Fine-Tuning using QLoRA on Kubernetes
description: An end-to-end MLOps pipeline for fine-tuning TinyLlama on Kubernetes using QLoRA and the Alpaca dataset. This project automates model training and deployment with a FastAPI inference service, showcasing production-grade practices for LLMs on GPU infrastructure.

name: BESS Coding Agent
description: An intelligent LLM-based ReAct coding agent using SmolAgents framework for Battery Energy Storage Systems (BESS) trading optimization. Features real-time Day-Ahead Market data analysis, chat UI, and Phoenix observability dashboard.

name: News Articles Summarizer
description: A comprehensive news summarization tool built with LangChain and multiple LLM endpoints (OpenAI GPT-4, Hugging Face T5). Streamlines content extraction and provides intelligent summarization of news articles.

name: Credit Card Approval Prediction using Snowpark ML
description: Implemented an end-to-end Credit Card approval predictor entirely inside Snowflake. Ingested the Kaggle dataset with Snowpark, engineered features, trained a classifier using Snowpark ML, and deployed it for real-time in-database scoring.

name: Multi-modal Video AI System
description: An advanced video understanding AI system using Video LLaVa model for predicting survey responses from video advertisements by analyzing visual data, descriptions, and captions with fine-tuned prompts.
